name: scrutiny
description: Scrutiny is a self-hosted S.M.A.R.T. monitoring system for hard drives that includes dashboards, alerts, and analytics for drive health tracking.
features: S.M.A.R.T. monitoring: Tracks hard drive health metrics using S.M.A.R.T. data from smartctl.
Dashboard visualization: Displays drive health, temperature, and failure predictions in intuitive charts.
Alert notifications: Sends email, Slack, or webhook alerts when drives show signs of failure.
Historical tracking: Stores S.M.A.R.T. metrics over time to identify degradation trends.
Multi-drive support: Monitors all connected drives including HDDs, SSDs, and NVMe devices.
Failure prediction: Uses S.M.A.R.T. thresholds and algorithms to predict drive failures.
Temperature monitoring: Tracks drive temperatures and alerts on overheating conditions.
Web interface: Access drive health information from any device via responsive web UI.
Docker support: Deploy as a container with automatic drive detection and monitoring.
API access: Query drive health data programmatically for integration with other tools.
Custom thresholds: Configure alert thresholds for specific S.M.A.R.T. attributes.
Export reports: Generate health reports for documentation and warranty claims.
